mapper.select: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from ( select n.*, s.sort_name from notice n , sort s where n.sort_num = s.sort_num order by n.notice_num desc ) a

select a.* from ( select n.*, s.sort_name, d.notice_detail_num, d.notice_orgfile, d.notice_savefile, d.notice_filesize from notice n, notice_detail d, sort s where n.sort_num = s.sort_num and n.notice_num = d.notice_num ) a where notice_num = #{notice_num}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_hit=notice_hit+1 where notice_num=#{notice_num}
mapper.select: select * from ( select n.*,s.sort_name from notice n, sort s where n.sort_num = s.sort_num and notice_num > #{notice_num} order by n.notice_num asc ) where rownum=1
select * from ( select n.*,s.sort_name from notice n, sort s where n.sort_num = s.sort_num and notice_num < #{notice_num} order by n.notice_num desc ) where rownum=1
